title: Personal Finance: In the absence of a Will inheritance of an NRI’s asset is a challenge even for his - Free Press Journal
content: Personal Finance: In the absence of a Will inheritance of an NRI’s asset is a challenge even for his  Free Press Journal
description: It was quite a complicated situation for the family, when Vishal Oberoi passed away in 2013 in Ontario, Canada; leaving behind his sizable wealth worth millions, without naming the successors of his lifetime earnings and properties.
